name: Akeneo
description: Akeneo offers a product information management (PIM) solution that helps businesses manage and enrich product data.

name: Bluestone PIM
description: Bluestone PIM provides a cloud-native PIM solution that supports efficient product data management and distribution.

name: inriver
description: inriver offers a PIM solution that helps businesses centralize and manage product information for enhanced e-commerce operations.

name: Pimberly
description: Pimberly offers a cloud-based PIM solution that helps businesses manage and enrich product data effectively.

name: Salsify
description: Salsify provides a PIM platform that supports product content management and syndication across multiple channels.
